description: The notification will be sent when AP changes the work mode, and
h3cDot11APWorkMode suggests which work mode will be used by AP.
To uniquely identify each AP, and relation-ship between h3cDot11APID
and AP device will be static.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APID

description: Represents what work mode for AP.
The following values are supported:
normal(1) - AP will supply WLAN service.
monitor(2) - AP will be a monitor to detect attack.
hybrid(3) - AP will supply WLAN service and detect attack.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APChgWorkMode

description: The notification will represent errors caused by the
configuration operation of AP.

description: Represents each radio.

description: Represents errors caused by configuration operation.
The following values are supported:
config(1) - Configuration error
hwerror(2) - Hardware error
swerror(3) - Software error
radar(4) - Radar Detection
unknown(8) - Unknown reason

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11DetcAdjChlIntfAPClear A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APMtAPID s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APMtRadioID i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APMtChannel i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APMtAdjChannel i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APMtInterfMacAdd s EXAMPL A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-APMT-MIB::h3cDot11APMtFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: To uniquely identify each AP.
